name: pantry-party
description: Our application allows users to host a virtual cooking party. Users will have the option to find recipes and follow an interactactive cooking video for recipes or input their personal recipe and follow the directions on a streaming platform. Pantry Party allows users to virtually interact with others and cook a meal in the comfort of their home - giving them the ability to share a meal together while apart.

scripts.heroku-prebuild: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && npm run build
